1.0.name: wordpress/wp-tidy-dashboard-widgets
1.0.description:
Lets you selectively tidy up the WordPress dashboard widgets for all users.

You can optionally hide the following widgets:

  • Incoming Links
  • Other WordPress News
  • Plugins
  • Quick Press
  • Recent Comments
  • Recent Drafts
  • Right Now
  • WordPress Blog
